thread.title: 12-County Coalition in Florida Seeks New Voting Machines By Election Season
thread.title_full: 12-County Coalition in Florida Seeks New Voting Machines By Election Season

title: 12-County Coalition in Florida Seeks New Voting Machines By Election Season
text:
25 12-County Coalition in Florida Seeks New Voting Machines By Election Season 
Government Technology: After the Bush-Gore debacle in 2000, Florida became proactive. Punch cards and hanging chads were replaced with optical scanners.But that was 15 years ago, and those new optical scanners are now old technology.“It’s an area of concern,” said Highlands County Elections Supervisor Penny Ogg.
